cache.help: Speeds up queries through local payment cache, but may extend the initial loading time.

network.title: Network
network.desc: Optional: Full-History Horizon for Deep History
network.autoUseFull: Automatically use if the from-date is older than the server history.
network.historyInfo: The free Horizon servers operated by the Stellar Development Foundation provide only about one year of history. For older data, you will need to either operate your own Horizon node or rely on third-party/paid services.
